properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 10:02PM EST until February 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service Blacksburg Va has issued
a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia...

Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County


...Runoff continues into area rivers, creeks, and streams as
a result of recent repeated rainfall and saturated ground...

The National Weather Service in Blacksburg Va has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Dan River at South Boston.
* from 12 AM EST Saturday until Saturday afternoon.
* At 9 PM EST Friday the stage was 21.9 feet...and very slowly rising.
* Flood Stage is 22.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast. Forecast to rise right to flood stage
and then remain near flood stage until Saturday afternoon at which
time it will drop below flood stage.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 21.6
feet on May 7 2017.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to NOAA weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
